text: Augusto Giomo (3 February 1940 â€“ 27 January 2016) was an Italian basketball player. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Summer Olympics. He finished in fourth and fifth place. His younger brother Giorgio played for Italy at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Treviso. Giomo died in Treviso, from cancer, on 27 January 2016. He was aged 75. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Competitors at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:1964 Summer Olympics Category:Italian basketball players Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:People from Treviso
title: Augusto Giomo
